longBusinessSummary: Neueon Towers Limited manufactures electrical fans and home appliances in India. The company offers in steel; power and telecom infra; domestic appliances; light engineering, such as bearings and castings; and urban infrastructure products. The company was formerly known as Sujana Towers Limited and changed its name to Neueon Towers Limited in October 2016. Neueon Towers Limited incorporated in 2006 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
